      • getEntityManager

        protected javax.persistence.EntityManager getEntityManager()
        Returns the entity manager of Hibernate/JPA. This is defined in build/web/WEB-INF/classes/META-INF/persistence.xml.
        Returns:
        EntityManager

      • getGuild

        public Guild getGuild(java.lang.String name)
        Retrieves the guild by name. Returns null if not found.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the guild.
        Returns:
        a guild or null.

      • getGuildHopefuls

        public java.util.List<Person> getGuildHopefuls(Guild aGuild)
        returns a list of persons that wish to become a member of a guild.
        Parameters:
        aGuild - the guild
        Returns:
        list of guild hopefuls.
        Throws:
        MudException - if something goes wrong.
